name: Mr. Havuch
description:
Mr. Havuch, the game, is based on a character from an indie comic released by Ilgaz Süer.  Mr Havuch (original spelling Mr. Havuç, translation Mr. Carrot) is a super hero who kills his enemies by hitting them with his pointy end. The point of the game is to kill monsters and collect loot.

Controls are explained in the tutorial level. If you fall of a cliff or you get stuck by ending up in a pit use ESC to restart the level. Sound may glitch a little on some mobile platforms. Apparently this is not an unheard of problem with HTML5 exports of Godot.
